name: ThisWeek'sNewComicBooks
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Neighborhood Comics is a comic book shop located in Savannah, GA and online at NeighborhoodComics.com. This flash briefing skill provides a list of the new comic book releases from major publishers like DC, Marvel, Image, Dark Horse, Boom, IDW and more. It also includes our pick of the week at the top of every broadcast. New episodes are released every week. Add us to your flash briefing to never miss out on the latest comics!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
